import React, {useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import {setResponseMessage} from '../helperFunctions' const AddReview = () => { const [{userName,stars,title,photo,blurb,cafeName}, setFormDetails] = useState({userName:'', stars:0, title:'', photo:'', blurb:'',cafeName:''}) const [submittedResponse, setSubmittedResponse] = useState('') const [showMessage, setShowMesage] = useState(true) const handleChange = (e) => { e.preventDefault() const {name,value} = e.target setFormDetails(prevForm => ({ ...prevForm, [name]:value })) } const handleSubmit = (e) => { console.log('submit function reached') e.preventDefault() const newReview = { userName:userName, stars:stars, title:title, photo:photo, blurb:blurb, cafeName:cafeName } axios.post('http://localhost:5000/api/add-review',newReview) .then(result => { setSubmittedResponse(result.data.message) }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err) }) } const handleClick = () => { setShowMesage() } const message = setResponseMessage(submittedResponse) return( <>

Add review

{message}

) } export default AddReview
